pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A utility for accessing various RIO media players.
Following players are supported: - Rio 600 (all sizes) - Rio 800 (all sizes) - Rio 900 (all sizes) - Nike psa [Play (Diamond MM version)] - Rio S-Series - Rio Fuse/Chiba/Cali - Rio Nitrus (Should mostly work) - Rio Riot (No download support) - Future flash players (Experimental)
Following players are unsupported: - Rio 500 - Rio One - Rio Karma - Phillips PSA
